original_text: Ahaz was twenty years old when he began to reign, and he reigned sixteen years in Jerusalem. And he did not do what was right in the eyes of the Lord his God, as his father David had done,
korean_text: 아하스가 왕이 될 때에 나이가 이십 세라 예루살렘에서 십육 년간 다스렸으나 그의 조상 다윗과 같지 아니하여 그의 하나님 여호와께서 보시기에 정직히 행하지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: and he reigned sixteen years in Jerusalem
And he did not do what was right
in the eyes of the Lord his God
as his father David had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 다윗이 행한 것과 같지 아니하였더라
